syntax: YIELD(settlement, maturity, rate, pr, redemption, frequency, [basis])

arguments.name: Settlement
arguments.description: The security's settlement date. The security settlement date is the date after the issue date when the security is traded to the buyer.

arguments.name: Maturity
arguments.description: The security's maturity date. The maturity date is the date when the security expires.

arguments.name: Pr
arguments.description: The security's price per $100 face value.

arguments.name: Redemption
arguments.description: The security's redemption value per $100 face value.

arguments.name: Frequency
arguments.description: The number of coupon payments per year. For annual payments, frequency = 1; for semiannual, frequency = 2; for quarterly, frequency = 4.

arguments.name: Basis
arguments.description: The type of day count basis to use.
